exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameBgSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="800" height="480" id="bgGroup">
		<e:Image id="sky" source="bg_sky" y="0"/>
		<e:Image source="bg_sky" id="sky0"/>
		<e:Image id="hill" source="bg_wall" y="130"/>
		<e:Image source="bg_wall" y="130" id="hill0"/>
		<e:Image id="grass" source="bg_grass" y="262"/>
		<e:Image source="bg_grass" id="grass0" y="262"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="logo" y="433" left="42" id="logo" x="10"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<ns1:GameBg id="gameBg" skinName="GameBgSkin"/>
	<e:Group id="uiGroup" height="480" width="800" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image source="scrollBtn" left="52" y="53"/>
		<e:Rect id="controlBtn" height="480" width="269" x="0" y="-1" fillAlpha="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="timeGroup" height="43" width="152" y="18" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="timeBg" source="scoreBg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="timeLabel" text="30s" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="90" size="30" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xF9F660" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="scoreGroup" height="42" width="153" y="20" right="28">
		<e:Image id="scoreBg" source="scoreBg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="scoreLabel" verticalAlign="middle" text="999" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="105" size="30" textColor="0xF1944E" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="countDownGroup" height="480" width="800" y="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="countDown1" source="gameSheet_json.countdown1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="countDown2" source="gameSheet_json.countdown2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="countDown3" source="gameSheet_json.countdown3" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="hand" source="gameSheet_json.hand" x="137" y="126"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<ns1:GameBg skinName="GameBgSkin"/>
	<e:Image id="title" source="home_title" horizontalCenter="40.5" y="5"/>
	<e:Group id="rankGroup" height="155" width="200" y="10" right="-15">
		<e:Image id="prizeBtn" source="prizeBtn" y="16" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="rankBtn" source="rankBtn" y="65" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="acceptGroup" height="300" width="468" y="140" horizontalCenter="-6" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="home_bg" x="8" y="38"/>
		<e:Label id="acceptLabel" text="小红帽邀请你加入xxxxx队伍" x="32" y="48" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" textColor="0x050000" width="405" height="106" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" multiline="true"/>
		<e:Image id="acceptBtn" source="acceptBtn" x="63" y="142" width="164" height="63"/>
		<e:Image id="ruleBtn" x="255" y="144" source="ruleBtn2_png" width="159" height="61"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="invitFailGroup" y="219" width="477" height="300" horizontalCenter="-0.5">
		<e:Image source="home_bg" y="38" x="8"/>
		<e:Label id="invitFailLabel" width="404" y="68" textColor="0x050000" verticalAlign="middle" text="游戏队伍已满。可以自己组队游戏。赢取千元大奖。" fontFamily="微软雅黑" multiline="true" height="106" size="25" x="32" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Image id="closeInvitBtn" source="xBtn" x="417" y="22"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="beginGroup" height="200" width="759" y="257" horizontalCenter="0.5" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="homeText00" x="253" y="-17"/>
		<e:Image id="beginBtn" source="beginBtn" x="33" y="71"/>
		<e:Image id="teamBtn" source="teamBtn" x="291" y="75"/>
		<e:Image id="ruleBtn2" source="ruleBtn" x="536" y="74"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MyTeamPanelSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group height="480" width="800" y="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect height="480" width="1500" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7" x="-350"/>
		<e:Image source="ruleBg" width="516" y="39" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="xBtn" x="609" y="28"/>
		<e:Label text="团队：" x="174" y="83" size="25" textColor="0x050000" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<e:Label id="teamLabel0" y="85" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="260" width="142"/>
		<e:Label y="253" textColor="0x050000" text="团队：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25" x="174"/>
		<e:Label id="teamLabel1" y="255" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="142" size="25" x="260"/>
		<e:Label id="memberName0" y="139" textColor="0x050000" text="啊啊啊啊啊啊" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="247" height="48" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="memberScore0" y="186" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="247"/>
		<e:Label id="memberName1" y="139" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="404" height="48" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="memberScore1" y="186" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="404"/>
		<e:Label id="memberName2" y="139" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="564" height="48" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="memberScore2" y="186" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="564"/>
		<e:Image source="panelSheet_json.line" width="528" height="40" y="220" x="139"/>
		<e:Group id="memberHead0" height="60" width="60" x="179" y="141"/>
		<e:Group id="memberHead1" width="60" y="141" height="60" x="336"/>
		<e:Group id="memberHead2" width="60" y="141" height="60" x="496"/>
		<e:Label id="memberName3" y="298" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="247" height="48" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="memberScore3" y="347" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="247"/>
		<e:Label id="memberName4" y="298" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="404" height="48" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="memberScore4" y="347" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="404"/>
		<e:Label id="memberName5" y="298" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="564" height="48" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="memberScore5" y="347" textColor="0x050000" text="111" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="75" size="15" x="564"/>
		<e:Group id="memberHead3" width="60" y="301" height="60" x="179"/>
		<e:Group id="memberHead4" width="60" y="301" height="60" x="338"/>
		<e:Group id="memberHead5" width="60" y="301" height="60" x="496"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PrizePanelSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group height="480" width="800" y="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect height="480" width="1500" fillAlpha="0.7" x="-200"/>
		<e:Image source="ruleBg" height="355" width="481" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="prizeTitle" y="71" x="333"/>
		<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="xBtn" x="599" y="54"/>
		<e:Image id="leaderBtn" source="leaderBtn" y="359" x="332"/>
		<e:Label id="weekLabel0" text="第一周最高奖：" y="110" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x030000" width="233" height="28" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="weekLabel1" y="140" textColor="0x030000" verticalAlign="middle" text="第一周最高奖：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="233" height="28" size="20" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="weekLabel2" y="171" textColor="0x030000" verticalAlign="middle" text="第一周最高奖：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="233" height="28" size="20" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="weekLabel3" y="201" textColor="0x030000" verticalAlign="middle" text="第一周最高奖：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="233" height="28" size="20" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="weekLabel4" y="232" textColor="0x030000" verticalAlign="middle" text="第一周最高奖：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="233" height="28" size="20" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="weekLabel5" y="262" textColor="0x030000" verticalAlign="middle" text="第一周最高奖：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="233" height="28" size="20" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label y="293" textColor="0x030000" verticalAlign="middle" text="四强队伍：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="233" height="28" size="20" horizontalCenter="-0.5" x="10"/>
		<e:Label id="fourLabel" y="321" textColor="0x030000" verticalAlign="middle" text="四强队伍：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="439" height="28" size="20" horizontalCenter="-1.5" x="20"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RankPanelSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group height="480" width="800" y="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect fillAlpha="0.7" width="1500" height="480" y="0" x="-350"/>
		<e:Image source="rankBg" x="175" y="31"/>
		<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="xBtn" x="586" y="19"/>
		<e:Label text="我的团队" x="214" y="100" textColor="0x030000" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20"/>
		<e:Label y="198" textColor="0x030000" text="排名" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" x="235"/>
		<e:Label y="198" textColor="0x030000" text="队名" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" x="379"/>
		<e:Label y="198" textColor="0x030000" text="得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" x="522"/>
		<e:Label id="myNameLabel0" y="129" textColor="0x030000" text="我的团队" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" x="186" width="137" height="29" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Label id="myRankLabel0" y="128" textColor="0x030000" size="20" text="我的团队" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="146" height="28" x="326"/>
		<e:Label id="myScoreLabel0" y="129" textColor="0x030000" height="28" text="我的团队" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="139" size="20" x="476"/>
		<e:Label id="myScoreLabel1" y="162" textColor="0x030000" size="20" text="我的团队" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="139" height="28" x="475"/>
		<e:Label id="myRankLabel1" y="161" textColor="0x030000" height="28" text="我的团队" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="146" size="20" x="327"/>
		<e:Label id="myNameLabel1" y="161" textColor="0x030000" size="20" text="我的团队" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="137" height="29" x="187"/>
		<e:Label y="100" textColor="0x030000" text="团队排名" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" x="357"/>
		<e:Label y="100" textColor="0x030000" text="团队得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" x="502"/>
		<e:Scroller width="408" height="200" y="230" x="196" scrollPolicyH="off" scrollPolicyV="auto">
			<e:Group>
				<e:Group id="rankGroup0" height="32" width="412" x="18" y="7">
					<e:Label id="rankLabel0" y="22" text="团队得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" x="72" height="26" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="133" textColor="0xF0F01D"/>
					<e:Label id="nameLabel0" y="32" size="20" text="团队得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="133" height="26" x="82" textColor="0xF0F01D"/>
					<e:Label id="scoreLabel0" y="42" height="26" text="团队得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="133" size="20" x="92" textColor="0xF0F01D"/>
					<e:layout>
						<e:HorizontalLayout/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group y="17" id="rankGroup1" width="412" height="32" x="28">
					<e:layout>
						<e:HorizontalLayout/>
					</e:layout>
					<e:Label x="72" y="22" textColor="0x030000" size="20" text="团队得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="133" height="26" id="rankLabel1"/>
					<e:Label x="82" y="32" textColor="0x030000" height="26" text="团队得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="133" size="20" id="nameLabel1"/>
					<e:Label x="92" y="42" textColor="0x030000" size="20" text="团队得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="133" height="26" id="scoreLabel1"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Group y="27" id="rankGroup2" width="412" height="32" x="38">

				</e:Group>

					<e:Label x="82" y="32" textColor="0x030000" height="26" text="团队得分" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="133" size="20" id="nameLabel3"/>
